name: Ulta sida-ek-saman
content:
```python
name = ['N', 'I', 'T', 'I', 'N']
fevicol = ''
i = 0
name_length = len(name)
while i <= name_length:
  fevicol = name[i]

print(fevicol)
```
###### OUTPUT: NITIN

```python
name = ['N', 'I', 'T', 'I', 'N']
fevicol = ''
i = 0
name_length = name
while i < name_length:

print(fevicol)
```
